Class S4DocumentToUimaCasConverter

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    A CAS converter transforming a S4 document into a UIMA CAS structure.

        public void convertAnnotations(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas cas,
                      String serviceType)
        Method implementing the whole S4-UIMA annotation conversion logic.
        Parameters:
        cas - the CAS object from the Annotator component
        serviceType - type of the S4 service: com.ontotext.s4.api.types.sbt, com.ontotext.s4.api.types.news, com.ontotext.s4.api.types.twitie

      • inferCasTypeSystem

        public org.apache.uima.resource.metadata.TypeSystemDescription inferCasTypeSystem(String serviceType)
        Used for dynamic type system generation or generation of such from external sources like files with the annotations and their features or something else.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - type of the S4 service: com.ontotext.s4.api.types.sbt, com.ontotext.s4.api.types.news, com.ontotext.s4.api.types.twitie
        Returns:
        a TypeSystemDescription used for generation of a real CAS type system
